name: Sieni
description:
An experience where you play as a girl living on the remote island of Sieni. It is a sunny day, and what better time could there be for a picnic? Find and collect all the delicate mushrooms, listen to the music, and see your score at the end. Who knows, maybe you can become a quick professional mushroom picker?

Gather enough for a picnic on the paradise island of Sieni!
